title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
Clean board, already tried clean ME, different SSD with clean install of MacOS and the result is the same, Mac chimes, bar starts to load and sometimes it may get to the end but OS never loads, starting in recovery mode same thing.

When staring in Verbose mode gets stuck in: " In memory Panic Stackshot Succeded" .... Attempting system restart

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
May have RAM problem.
Did you try safe mode?

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message: Safe Mode same thing, gets stuck loading bar.

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
Try new full BIOS, clean ME.
Also test if boots into Windows.

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
Full BIOS with clean ME same problem.

Booting into Windows tries to star but soon after I get Your PC ran into a problem and needs to restart....

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message: You can try changing RAM chips.

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message: Installed new RAM, all 4 chips, also new EFI chip with clean BIOS, same problem still even in Windows and safe mode same exact problem :cry:

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
There is a modded ASD for this machine.
Not sure if helps in this case, but you can try.

I suspect CPU...

title: 820-00165 Won't finish booting
message:
Thanks, I have the regular ASD, I will check if I can get the modded one.

I think it is the CPU as it gets really hot quickly.
